replies.body:
> reported anyway gl with your 14 day ban, muted.

Made my day..

I would not say that justifies a 14 day ban by itself, but you have obviously had previous warnings. You are on thin ice after that, riot has no patience for people who ignore warnings and continue to flame.

Your next infraction, _anything_, will be permban.

Flaming wont make your team better, makes you lose far more games, and makes you play worse. Dont do it.
previous warnings? its a new lvl 25 account without any bans or restrictions prior.

im telling you, maybe even someone from riot itself can confirm that this has been my first and only ban/restriction.

> [{quoted}](name=AlmightyNoX,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=ohtKxBRP,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2018-02-26T23:19:18.848+0000)
>
> im telling you, maybe even someone from riot itself can confirm that this has been my first and only ban/restriction.

So is that why you are making a new account..? Bans are always reviewed by a real person, and that would never have even been brought to their attention by the system without prior warnings.

Have you gotten any replies to a support ticket?
not yet, no.

Possible reasons for a 14 day ban:

1. Being negative in general after a 25-game chat restriction could result in a 14-day ban as that is the next step in punishment tiers.

2. Intentional feeding or throwing games can sometimes be detected by the system but have incorrect chat logs selected from your match history to show to you.

3. A mistake could have been made, in which case you should submit a support ticket to ask for them to review your case. Remember to play nice, if you act like a dick to them then they will shut your case before having the time to read into it and see whether you are innocent or not.
no restrictions earlier, maybe 2. can be a wrong chat log, where i might have been more aggressive.
Well then it can't hurt to try and contact player support, good luck with your case. I hope that they can either lift the punishment or clarify whether these were the correct logs or not.
anytime u tell someone to report someone they will report you instead
and that justifies a 14 day ban?

It's not whether or not a _blank_ punishment was justified, rather just if **a** punishment was justified. LoL uses punishment tiers

> 10 game chat restrict
> 25 game chat restrict
> 14-day suspension
> Permanent Ban

Report calling/threatening is considered harassment, though mild, it can help build to the next punishment. 1 report is all it takes and saying you are reporting almost always does nothing.

Per the PB boards motto
"Mute, Report and Move On"
never had any restrictions, still instant 14 day ban.

Hmm that is strange... Try submitting a ticket then, maybe you can get it reduced.

And to add onto Xidphel:
4. The IFS labeled it wrong and it is for a trolling/feeding/boosting/etc that are always met with a 14-day suspension. Not saying you did, just the possibility of it.

I can think of a few reason:

1. You're lying about that.
2. There is indeed an error on the IFS' end.
3. You said something in pre/post-game chat that warrants a 14-day ban.
if you do it consistently yea, and were all pretty sure you do
why do you assume stuff you have no proof?

people don't just randomly decide to be toxic for only one game in the manner you were.

Thats a consistent type.
It justifies punishment.
so, basically there is no real proof given for a 14 day ban, or any reasoning why i didnt get a 10 day chat restriction before i get an instant 14 day ban.

I'm seeing a couple of games where you were intentionally throwing in your recent history.

A trundle game 2 hours ago where you sold all your items and bought all tears at 13min in a 20 min game.
A morgana game 18 hours ago where you sell all your items to go attack spd and atk dmg at 14min (24 min game), only to sell it all again near the end of the game and buy all tears.

http://euw.op.gg/summoner/userName=ALMIGHTYNOX

Trolling/intentionally feeding could have upgraded your ban. Don't troll. You shouldn't need a warning for that.
i love how you mentioned the trundle game 2 hours ago, because if you look into it, you see our adc being afk for the whole game with 9cs.
Not sure how that absolves you of intentionally trolling the game.
because we agreed to open and ff, we couldnt win this game which was sad.

I'm not inclined to believe you with how well the Lucian was doing, how much damage he managed to do to the enemy team, and the fact that your team was still occasionally killing an enemy champion or two. All after you bought all tears.

In fact, it looks like everyone but you and the afk was still CS'ing.
Im not gonna justify myself here, just gonna say i tried to play with lucian on top until a point where we said to ff and just roamed in our base, it was a blind normal after all.
If everyone was roaming in the base, how was everyone getting CS (except you)? If an agreement was made to open mid, wouldn't they have stopped?
no, lucian still cs'd and farmed. But thats not up to me.

Lucian wasn't the only one who CS'ed. Everyone on the team except you and the afk was still getting CS.

What is up to you is your own actions.
so me still getting assists up till the end doesnt matter too? dunno why would you dig into something like that where we would have lost either way.

>so me still getting assists up till the end doesnt matter too?

The instant you start trolling you're guilty of trolling regardless of your actions before.

>dunno why would you dig into something like that where we would have lost either way.

Because you're asking why you were banned for 14-days. Intentionally feeding bans start at 14-days so it would explain it.
how is that related to "abusive player reported comms" ? and really, I've never seen someone getting an instant 14 day ban for trolling.

As HalcyonDweller mentioned, intentional feeding and trolling bans sometimes sends you whatever chatlogs it scrounges up.

And trolling/intentional feeding punishments start at 14-day because giving a chat restriction for either of those is silly.
